com.mindalliance.configuration

Class DataController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindalliance.configuration.DataController

  • public class DataController
extends java.lang.Object
    The DataLocators class contains the methods for manipulating data such as reading test data from CSV file which we can use throughout the application.
    Author:
    AFourTech

      • getPageDataElements

        public java.lang.String getPageDataElements(java.lang.String fileName,
                                   java.lang.String elementName,
                                   java.lang.String attributeName)
                                     throws UIAutomationException
        Gets the page data elements (Like xpath / id / classname / linktext / partiallinktext) stored in the xml file 'fileName'
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of XML file of which to get elements.
        elementName - GivenName in the XML file
        attributeName - Name of the attribute in the XML file
        Returns:
        attributeValue Value associated with the 'attributeName'
        Throws:
        UIAutomationException
